TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ImapCapabilities extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Capabilities supported by an IMAP server.
Docs.remarks: Capabilities are read as part of the response to the CAPABILITY command that is issued during the connection and authentication phases of the .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Imap.ImapCapabilities Binary = int32(2048)

Docs.summary: The server supports the BINARY content extension defined in rfc3516.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Imap.ImapCapabilities Catenate = int32(16384)

Docs.summary: The server supports the CATENATE extension defined in rfc4469.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Imap.ImapCapabilities Children = int32(128)

Docs.summary: The server supports the CHILDREN extension defined in rfc3348.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Imap.ImapCapabilities Compress = int32(262144)

Docs.summary: The server supports the COMPRESS extension defined in rfc4978.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Imap.ImapCapabilities CondStore = int32(32768)

Docs.summary: The server supports the CONDSTORE extension defined in rfc4551.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Imap.ImapCapabilities Convert = int32(2097152)

Docs.summary: The server supports the CONVERT extension defined in rfc5259.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Imap.ImapCapabilities Enable = int32(524288)

Docs.summary: The server supports the ENABLE extension defined in rfc5161.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Imap.ImapCapabilities ESearch = int32(65536)

Docs.summary: The server supports the ESEARCH extension defined in rfc4731.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Imap.ImapCapabilities Filters = int32(8388608)

Docs.summary: The server supports the FILTERS extension defined in rfc5466.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Imap.ImapCapabilities GMailExt1 = int32(134217728)

Docs.summary: The server supports the X-GM-EXT1 extension (GMail).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Imap.ImapCapabilities Idle = int32(32)

Docs.summary: The server supports the IDLE extension defined in rfc2177.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Imap.ImapCapabilities IMAP4 = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The server implements the core IMAP4 commands.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Imap.ImapCapabilities IMAP4rev1 = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The server implements the core IMAP4rev1 commands.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Imap.ImapCapabilities ListExtended = int32(1048576)

Docs.summary: The server supports the LIST-EXTENDED extension defined in rfc5258.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Imap.ImapCapabilities LiteralPlus = int32(16)

Docs.summary: The server supports the LITERAL+ extension defined in rfc2088.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Imap.ImapCapabilities LoginDisabled = int32(256)

Docs.summary: The server supports the LOGINDISABLED extension defined in rfc3501.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Imap.ImapCapabilities MetaData = int32(4194304)

Docs.summary: The server supports the METADATA extension defined in rfc5464.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Imap.ImapCapabilities Move = int32(33554432)

Docs.summary: The server supports the MOVE extension defined in rfc6851.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Imap.ImapCapabilities MultiAppend = int32(1024)

Docs.summary: The server supports the MULTIAPPEND extension defined in rfc3502.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Imap.ImapCapabilities Namespace = int32(64)

Docs.summary: The server supports the NAMESPACE extension defined in rfc2342.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MailKit.Net.Imap.ImapCapabilities None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The server does not support any additional extensions.

Docs.summary: The server supports the QUOTA extension defined in rfc2087.

Docs.summary: The server supports the SEPCIAL-USE extension defined in rfc6154.
